ingredients: 1 to 2 serranos or jalapeños, seeded and minced
1 medium russett potatoes, washed and diced small
1 1/2 pounds of cooked, shredded beef,pork or chicken
6 large roasted green chiles(Anaheim peppers), peeled and sliced into small strips
2 teaspoons chicken bouillon granules or chicken base
1/2 cup water or stock from cooking the meat
